titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable Thomas Adams Lord Major of the famous citie London, and the VVorshipfull the sheriffs, Master Thomas Foote, and Master John Kendrick, with the rest of the aldermen and their brethren

publicationStmt.publisher: for Benjamin Green, and are to be sold at his house in thee leg-Court in Fleetstreet, over against the VVhite-Friars,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his house in thee leg-Court in Fleetstreet, over against the VVhite-Friars
